law.text: The committee shall elect from its members one (1) to serve as chairman, one (1) as vice chairman, and the commissioner of the Department of Housing, Buildings and Construction or his or her designee shall serve as ex officio member of the committee (without a vote) and secretary. The committee shall meet at least quarterly and upon special call by the chairman or the secretary.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1679, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 53, effective July 1, 1978; and ch. 155, sec. 151, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 3; and ch. 299, sec. 66. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 3.
